A cooperation ninjutsu performed by [[Earth Release]] and [[Lightning Release]] users. The Earth Release user uses their [[chakra]] to create a spear made of earth, which is thrown to the ground. The Lightning Release user then electrifies the spear, causing severe damage to the opponent.

[[pl:Jirai Sōka no Jutsu]]
